briefdescription.para: Enumerator used for selecting the pin to be pulled down or up at the time of pin configuration.
Extra high drive '0', extra high drive '1'.
Enumerator used for selecting output drive mode.
Enumerator used for selecting the pin to sense high or low level on the pin input.
Pin controlled by Trace and Debug Subsystem.
Pin controlled by GPIO or peripherals with configurable pins.
Enumerator used for selecting the MCU/Subsystem to control the specified pin.
Enable retention for GPIO registers for Application domain.
Enable retention for GPIO registers for Radio core.

Function for configuring the GPIO pin range as output pins with normal drive strength. This function can be used to configure pin range as simple output with gate driving GPIO_PIN_CNF_DRIVE_S0S1 (normal cases).

simplesect.para: For configuring only one pin as output, use nrf_gpio_cfg_output. Sense capability on the pin is disabled and input is disconnected from the buffer as the pins are configured as output.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the start number (inclusive) in the range of pin numbers to be configured.
Specifies the end number (inclusive) in the range of pin numbers to be configured.

briefdescription.para: Function for configuring the GPIO pin range as input pins with given initial value set, hiding inner details. This function can be used to configure pin range as simple input.

simplesect.para: For configuring only one pin as input, use nrf_gpio_cfg_input. Sense capability on the pin is disabled and input is connected to buffer so that the GPIO->IN register is readable.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the start number (inclusive) in the range of pin numbers to be configured.
Specifies the end number (inclusive) in the range of pin numbers to be configured.
State of the pin range pull resistor (no pull, pulled down, or pulled high).

memberdef.argsstring: (uint32_t pin_number, nrf_gpio_pin_dir_t dir, nrf_gpio_pin_input_t input, nrf_gpio_pin_pull_t pull, nrf_gpio_pin_drive_t drive, nrf_gpio_pin_sense_t sense)
memberdef.name: nrf_gpio_cfg

detaileddescription.para: The main pin configuration function. This function allows to set any aspect in PIN_CNF register.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the pin number.
Pin direction.
Connect or disconnect the input buffer.
Pull configuration.
Drive configuration.
Pin sensing mechanism.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint32_t pin_number, const nrf_gpio_pin_dir_t *p_dir, const nrf_gpio_pin_input_t *p_input, const nrf_gpio_pin_pull_t *p_pull, const nrf_gpio_pin_drive_t *p_drive, const nrf_gpio_pin_sense_t *p_sense)
memberdef.name: nrf_gpio_reconfigure

simplesect.para: This function selectively updates fields in PIN_CNF register. Reconfiguration is performed in single register write. Fields for which new configuration is not provided remain unchanged.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the pin number.
Pin direction. If NULL, previous setting remains.
Connect or disconnect the input buffer. If NULL, previous setting remains.
Pull configuration. If NULL, previous setting remains.
Drive configuration. If NULL, previous setting remains.
Pin sensing mechanism. If NULL, previous setting remains.

briefdescription.para: Function for configuring the given GPIO pin number as output, hiding inner details. This function can be used to configure a pin as simple output with gate driving GPIO_PIN_CNF_DRIVE_S0S1 (normal cases).

simplesect.para: Sense capability on the pin is disabled and input is disconnected from the buffer as the pins are configured as output.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the pin number.

briefdescription.para: Function for configuring the given GPIO pin number as input, hiding inner details. This function can be used to configure a pin as simple input.

simplesect.para: Sense capability on the pin is disabled and input is connected to buffer so that the GPIO->IN register is readable.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the pin number.
State of the pin range pull resistor (no pull, pulled down, or pulled high).

briefdescription.para: Function for resetting pin configuration to its default state.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the pin number.

briefdescription.para: Function for configuring the given GPIO pin number as a watcher. Only input is connected.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the pin number.

briefdescription.para: Function for disconnecting input for the given GPIO.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the pin number.

briefdescription.para: Function for configuring the given GPIO pin number as input, hiding inner details. This function can be used to configure pin range as simple input. Sense capability on the pin is configurable and input is connected to buffer so that the GPIO->IN register is readable.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the pin number.
State of the pin pull resistor (no pull, pulled down, or pulled high).
Sense level of the pin (no sense, sense low, or sense high).

briefdescription.para: Function for configuring sense level for the given GPIO.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the pin number.
Sense configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the direction for a GPIO pin.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the pin number for which to set the direction.
Specifies the direction.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting a GPIO pin.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the pin number to be set.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing a GPIO pin.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the pin number to clear.

briefdescription.para: Function for toggling a GPIO pin.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the pin number to toggle.

briefdescription.para: Function for writing a value to a GPIO pin.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the pin number to write.

Specifies the value to be written to the pin.
0 Clears the pin.
>=1 Sets the pin.

briefdescription.para: Function for reading the input level of a GPIO pin.

detaileddescription.para: If the value returned by this function is to be valid, the pin's input buffer must be connected.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the pin number to read.

simplesect.para: 0 if the pin input level is low. Positive value if the pin is high.

briefdescription.para: Function for reading the output level of a GPIO pin.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the pin number to read.

simplesect.para: 0 if the pin output level is low. Positive value if pin output is high.

briefdescription.para: Function for reading the sense configuration of a GPIO pin.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the pin number to read.

simplesect.para: Sense configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for reading the direction configuration of a GPIO pin.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the pin number to read.

simplesect.para: Direction configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for reading the status of GPIO pin input buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Pin number to be read.
buffer configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for reading the pull configuration of a GPIO pin.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the pin number to read.
configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting output direction on the selected pins on the given port.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask specifying the pins to set as output.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting input direction on selected pins on a given port.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask that specifies the pins to be set as input.

briefdescription.para: Function for writing the direction configuration of the GPIO pins in the given port.

simplesect.para: This register is retained when retention is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask that specifies the direction of pins. Bit set means that the given pin is configured as output.

briefdescription.para: Function for reading the direction configuration of a GPIO port.

simplesect.para: This register is retained when retention is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Pin configuration of the current direction settings. Bit set means that the given pin is configured as output.

briefdescription.para: Function for reading the input signals of the GPIO pins on the given port.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the peripheral registers structure.

simplesect.para: Port input values.

briefdescription.para: Function for reading the output signals of the GPIO pins on the given port.

simplesect.para: This register is retained when retention is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the peripheral registers structure.

simplesect.para: Port output values.

briefdescription.para: Function for writing the GPIO pins output on a given port.

simplesect.para: This register is retained when retention is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Output port mask.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting high level on selected the GPIO pins on the given port.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask with pins to be set as logical high level.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting low level on selected the GPIO pins on the given port.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask with pins to be set as logical low level.

briefdescription.para: Function for reading pin state of multiple consecutive ports.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the first port to read.
Number of ports to read.
Pointer to output array where port states will be stored.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the impedance matching of the pins on the given port.

simplesect.para: Each bit sets certain impedance and have them in parallel when more than one bit is set. High impedance is set for the pin when all bits are disabled. When all bits are enabled, the resulting impedance is about 25 Ohm.
This register is retained when retention is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of impedances to be set, created using nrf_gpio_port_impedance_mask_t.

briefdescription.para: Function for geting the impedance matching of the pins on the given port.

simplesect.para: This register is retained when retention is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Mask of impedances set, created using nrf_gpio_port_impedance_mask_t.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the retention of the registers.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of retention domains to be enabled, created using nrf_gpio_retain_mask_t.

briefdescription.para: Function for geting the retention setting of the registers.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Mask of retention domains set, created using nrf_gpio_retain_mask_t.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the latched detect behaviour.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True if the latched LDETECT behaviour is to be used, false if DETECT is to be directly connected to PIN DETECT signals.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking the latched detect behaviour.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Latched LDETECT behaviour is used.
DETECT is directly connected to PIN DETECT signals.

briefdescription.para: Function for reading latch state of multiple consecutive ports.

simplesect.para: This register is retained when retention is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the first port to read.
Number of ports to read.
Pointer to output array where latch states will be stored.

briefdescription.para: Function for reading and immediate clearing latch state of multiple consecutive ports.

simplesect.para: This register is retained when retention is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the first port to read and clear.
Number of ports to read and clear.
Pointer to output array where latch states will be stored.

briefdescription.para: Function for reading latch state of single pin.

simplesect.para: This register is retained when retention is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pin number.

simplesect.para: 0 if latch is not set. Positive value otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing latch state of a single pin.

simplesect.para: This register is retained when retention is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pin number.

briefdescription.para: Function for selecting the MCU or Subsystem to control a GPIO pin.

simplesect.para: This register is retained when retention is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pin_number.
MCU/Subsystem to control the pin.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting whether the clock should be enabled for the specified GPIO pin.

simplesect.para: This register is retained when retention is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pin number.
True if clock is to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the clock enable setting for the specified GPIO pin.

simplesect.para: This register is retained when retention is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pin number.
Clock is enabled.
Clock is disabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if provided pin is present on the MCU.

parameterdescription.para: Number of the pin to be checked.
Pin is present.
Pin is not present.

briefdescription.para: Function for extracting port number and the relative pin number from the absolute pin number.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the absolute pin number overridden by the pin number that is relative to the port.

simplesect.para: Port number.

briefdescription.para: Function for extracting port and the relative pin number from the absolute pin number.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the absolute pin number overridden by the pin number that is relative to the port.

simplesect.para: Pointer to port register set.

briefdescription.para: Symbol indicating whether the functionality of latching GPIO state change is present.
Presence of MCU/Subsystem control selection for multiple peripherals.
Presence of drive control for impedance.
Macro for mapping port and pin numbers to values understandable for nrf_gpio functions.
Hardware access layer for managing the GPIO peripheral.
